author: Manuel Terron
description: Melon and vanilla liqueurs lightly sweeten and flavour the subtle maltiness of Lowland whisky.
name: Midtown Muse
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Lowland single malt scotch whisky
10 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)
22.5 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
